_comment: This data is an early work-in-progress and contains errors. Produced by @michaelh at Discuss and Discover SuttaCentral forum - please get in touch! Finished code forthcoming.

The qualities of a Realized One, a perfe: Freed by not grasping, due to disillusionment, dispassion, and cessation regarding form
Freed by not grasping, due to disillusionment, dispassion, and cessation regarding feeling
Freed by not grasping, due to disillusionment, dispassion, and cessation regarding perception
Freed by not grasping, due to disillusionment, dispassion, and cessation regarding choices
Freed by not grasping, due to disillusionment, dispassion, and cessation regarding consciousness
The difference between a Realized One, a: A Realized One gives rise to the unarisen path
A Realized One gives birth to the unborn path
A Realized One explains the unexplained path
A Realized One knows the path
A Realized One understands the path
A Realized One is an expert in the path
